channel.title: New people on forums
channel.description:
They're so friendly, like they type "hello" before they post their forum posts, and say "thanks" afterwards. They use "please" and such nice words.
the rest of you rectum pirates need to be nicer. "welcome to the int-" sHUT the FUQ up.
No but for real, anyone ever notice that?
"great, goudont's high again"

item.title: New people on forums
item.dc:creator: @goudont goudont
item.description:
@goudont wrote:

Uncalled:

fuck you, fucking idiot

that was Uncalled for

Read full topic

item.title: New people on forums
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

[quote=“Jmood, post:13, topic:549002”]Hello,

I must agree how nice it is when people create posts like this one. It shows respect to us higher status members who have proven our worth, we’re all looking for our successor so I must say if you post like this, you have my vote.

I must say how rude it must be for some of the other members, mostly ones from irc. Who come onto the forum and act all elitist. I know hurtful people like Albi and t4 who abuse other peoples rights, it’s a shame we don’t have more members like goudont. People like goudont who create threads for us to discuss and help inform our members about the big world events that are going on. I suggest goudont as section moderator of this section, Greeny should be demoted and banned for not being an active member of this community.

Thank You,
Jmood.[/quote]fuck you, fucking idiot

Read full topic

item.title: New people on forums
item.dc:creator: @goudont goudont
item.description:
@goudont wrote:

Svitkona:

I think it’s just confirmation bias, if you look for example in Server Help you’ll find a lot of posts with rude people as well.

off and on, yeah. but I’m talking new people, they’re friendly. Or they seem like it. Until they get comfortable on the forums and the vagina re-inverts it self into a penis.

Read full topic

I must agree how nice it is when people create posts like this one. It shows respect to us higher status members who have proven our worth, we’re all looking for our successor so I must say if you post like this, you have my vote.

I suggest goudont as section moderator of this section, Greeny should be demoted and banned for not being an active member of this community.

Thank You,
Jmood.[/quote]

thank you, you have made my 2015 better.

kronikz:

Hi Goudont it’s been a while man, good to see you’re still around!

jeez, you’re alive! Nice to see you too.

haha this thread started a war. Why can’t we all just be peaceful? Like, what example are we setting for the noobs?
no, but seriously. Get real, play nice, cunts. let us discuss and resolve this in a mature manner.

Read full topic

item.title: New people on forums
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

[quote=“Kidpaparoach, post:21, topic:549002”][quote author=Eyeownyew link=topic=667911.msg4467241#msg4467241 date=1420841844]

This is a good example of this community. Lol

This is a good example of THE INTERNET.

O.o. No it’s not, just Runescape related forums although even then mopar is the worst for it out of all the forums I know of.

you haven’t played any team oriented games have you
[/quote]
wut, I’ve played lots. Pls explain.[/quote]
you said runescape related forums have the only bad communities
that’s so far from true

Read full topic

This is a good example of THE INTERNET.

O.o. No it’s not, just Runescape related forums although even then mopar is the worst for it out of all the forums I know of.

If you cannot take some harsh words from a nobody, why even get on the internet?

Why so mad bbyg, maybe you should follow your own advice.

I was just saying what I have noticed, it wasn’t a complaint if that’s why you were getting so butthurt.

This is a good example of this community. Lol

This is a good example of THE INTERNET.

O.o. No it’s not, just Runescape related forums although even then mopar is the worst for it out of all the forums I know of.

You talking to me?[/quote]
wut?

u rtrded?
